definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be clear, clean, pure, alw. in moral sense (As. zakû Zim:BP; Aram. [[דְּכָא]], dko0, dkiy; cf. Ar. d-aka0 be bright (of a fire), pungent (of an odour); be acute, quick of mind)—
be clean, pure, of man, in the sight of God, Job 15:14, Job 25:4 (in both ‖[[יחדק]]; cf. also [[זַכּוּ]] Job 15:15, Job 25:5).
be clear, be justified = be regarded as just, righteous, of God, Ps 51:6 (‖[[תחדק]]), Mic 6:11.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Imv. m.pl. [[הִזַּכּוּ]] Is 1:16 make yourselves clean (‖[[רַחֲחוּ]]);—on form cf. Ges:§ 54, 2, b, Rem. Kö:Lgb. i, 345, 534 Sta:§ 129 d.
